subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Even with this season being Coach Bo Pelini’s first, Nebraska’s rabid fans are more than eager for him to revive the Cornhuskers, who have not won a Big 12 title since 1999.
snippet: Even with this season being Coach Bo Pelini’s first, Nebraska’s rabid fans are more than eager for him to revive the Cornhuskers, who have not won a Big 12 title since 1999.
